metadata.title: CVE-2022-22935 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in SaltStack Salt in versions before 3002.8, 3003.4, 3004.1. A minion authentication denial of service can cause a MiTM attacker to force a minion process to stop by impersonating a master.

criterions.comment: salt package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
